name: Figma 2 Notion
description:
Figma 2 Notion is useful plugin for export and sync images to Notion documents.


Features

  • Synced Images - You just run again plugin when you change your Figma document. Image in Notion will be refresh automatically
  • Responsive - Perfect fit for all view. Auto resize for all resolutions
  • Embed - Style options for you use case. Naked or Browser window
